title: Tooltips and Helptips Demo
subtitle: You can define tooltips and helptips for every type of interactive component.

text: #Welcome to the Lab help system!
You are reading an initial help tip, which isn't connected to any of interactive components.
To see next help tip just click overlay area or help tip itself. You can leave help system
at any moment by clicking **x** sign in the upper-left corner.
Note that you can use **Markdown syntax** inside help tips.
You can reference all interactive components using their IDs defined in components list.
To create help tip for the model you should use **model** ID:
"helpTips": [
"component": "model",
